lead_paragraph: Kenneth Thompson, a candidate for Kings County District Attorney, is asking Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo for an independent investigation of dozens of prosecutions involving the work of a retired police detective, Louis Scarcella, that have recently come under scrutiny. Related Article »
